title: Bolsonaro says he 'will respect the constitution'
description: The Brazilian President breaks days of silence following Sunday's poll defeat. Also: Benjamin Netanyahu could be about to make another comeback following Israeli elections, and, why the Italian government isn't raving about raves.
itunes:subtitle: Brazilian President breaks days of silence following poll defeat
itunes:summary: The Brazilian President breaks days of silence following Sunday's poll defeat. Also: Benjamin Netanyahu could be about to make another comeback following Israeli elections, and, why the Italian government isn't raving about raves.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
